player_0.line_0: Welcome! This is the Player speaking from the template dialogue system.
player_0.line_1: You can easily duplicate this scene and change the JSON file to create new scenes.
player_0.line_2: Just update the export variables in the script to point to your new JSON!

kingdoma_0.line_0: Hello! I'm from Kingdom A and this template makes it easy to add new characters.
kingdoma_0.line_1: Simply add new TextureRect nodes ending with 'PortraitStandIn' to add more characters.
kingdoma_0.line_2: The system will automatically detect and map them!

player_1.line_0: To add a new character like Kingdom B, just add 'KingdombPortraitStandIn' node.
player_1.line_1: Then add dialogue entries like 'kingdomb_0', 'kingdomb_1', etc. in your JSON.
player_1.line_2: The system handles the rest automatically!

kingdoma_1.line_0: This template keeps all the working features you loved.
kingdoma_1.line_1: But now it's super easy to create new scenes quickly!
